title: What is the most liked song on Spotify? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here's the list of most liked songs on Spotify: "Shape of You" by Ed Sheeran "Rockstar" by Post Malone feat. 21 Savage "One Dance" by Drake feat. Wizkid and Kyla "Dance Monkey" by Tones and I "Closer" by The Chainsmokers feat. Halsey Espeshially, first one and the last one are my favourites after listening to them alive!
